Sarah Grabinski is a student at Case Western Reserve University pursuing a Master's degree in Biostatistics specializing in Genomics and Bioinformatics. She will graduate in August 2023 to pursue work as a biostatistician. She lives outside of Cleveland, Ohio with her partner John, a dog, two cats, and an axolotl. Outside of data science, she loves cooking, soccer, Star Trek, and science fiction novels.
